details.description: Evaluated foliar addition. Evaluated NaBi on aO3, SiQ, Siow, Suju, MqO. Evaluated ascorbic acid on Carbon, QlO, tow. Identified usage of additives (preliminary).

Evaluated AgMOy, Ql, preliminary experiments. Evaluated sucrose and saccharin on Carbon, SiO2, butyl, tow. Evaluated salicylic acid on Carbon, SiO2 (preserve). Evaluated poly N,N'-phenylurea (synthesized methyl bis salicylideneimine) cobalt complex.
Evaluated two Pd/Cu catalysts based on the legal form of Rowe FormTs (or Ql03, SiO2-Ql, os).
